syllabus.title: Six modules blended across design, code, and strategy.
syllabus.subtitle: CoociDev Learn_Web is built for designers moving into hybrid UI/front-end roles.
items: Foundations: research, UX flows, accessibility, HTML/CSS baseline.
Systems thinking: tokens, grids, responsive typography, component APIs.
Modern front-end: semantic HTML, CSS architecture, Three.js integration.
Motion & 3D: micro-interactions, reduced motion patterns, performance.
Shipping & SEO: audits, Lighthouse, content ops, multi-lingual support.
Career studio: portfolio review, interview loops, offer negotiation.
